name: Main St
description: The western terminus of Main Street, a quiet end to a bustling thoroughfare, where the promise of open spaces begins. The street continues to the east, leading back toward the vibrant heart of town, a ribbon of charming commerce. To the west, the sturdy Clayton Ravine Bridge beckons, a gateway to the serene countryside. The air is filled with the scent of freshly baked bread from a nearby bakery and the faint, sweet smell of blooming flowers, a delightful blend of town and country.
